title: Interpretation of seeing the sea in a dream for a single woman

preview.html: We present to you the interpretation of seeing the sea in a dream for single people and different situations, as the interpretation of seeing the sea in a dream varies according to the situation in which it was seen. We learn about these meanings as mentioned by dream interpreters through this encyclopedia article. Interpretation of seeing the seashore in a dream Dream interpretation scholars say that seeing the seashore in a dream is one of the most promising visions, because it indicates peace, contentment and security. Seeing the seashore in clear turquoise color indicates That the dreamer was exposed to many problems and sorrows, but he was able to overcome and overcome them, and now he enjoys peace and stability in his life. And the young man who sees in his dream the seashore, and the sea was pure and clear, his dreams showed that the Almighty God will give him a good wife who will take care of him and protect his home, He enjoys it. He also has a wonderful beauty and she will help him in life, and he will live a happy life with her, God willing. Interpretation of seeing the sea in a dream for a single woman: If an unmarried girl sees that she is standing on the beach, and it is close to her, and the waves are calm and the water is clear, this indicates that there is a good man proposing to her And she will be happy. With this post. If she is engaged, then this vision indicates that her wedding date is approaching and she must prepare herself for the upcoming preparations for the new life. And if she sees that she is sitting on the sand on the beach, contemplating the sea and the beautiful scenery around her, then this dream symbolizes that there are many things occupying this woman’s mind. The girl for her future. He wants to make decisions about these matters, but he cannot make them easily. When an unmarried girl saw the seashore and was close, and she looked at it and saw it all around her in all respects, it is good news for her that she will receive a lot of money. Interpretation of a dream about a dream about an open sea wave for a single woman’s vision The raging sea and its high waves in an unmarried girl’s dream symbolize the problems she is going through in her life and the psychological crises she is going through, and may indicate problems between her and her family or close friends. And if she sees in her dream that she is struggling with the high waves in the sea, and trying to get out of them, then This dream shows her continuous efforts and efforts to improve her social and employment conditions. It also shows her constant thinking about solutions to the problems that stand in her way, and if she sees that she has gotten out of them. It was good news for her to achieve her ambitions and dreams and get rid of her problems, God willing. And if she sees that she is struggling with the high waves, and does not find a way to survive, then this dream symbolizes that she is in a relationship with a person who was rejected by her family because of his poor financial conditions, but she loves him. And he can't get away from it. If she saw that someone helped her overcome the high waves and get out of the sea safely, then this dream symbolizes that someone will offer her marriage and it will be compensation for the years she lived before that. Among the interpretations given to a girl seeing the wave of the open sea in her dream is that this dream symbolizes That this girl is committing disobedience

preview.html: In the visions that indicate pregnancy, a married woman sees many dreams that have many signs and indicators that indicate the approaching date of pregnancy. The world of visions and dreams is full of many symbols and signs that need interpretation and explanation. In the following lines of this article, we will present several visions indicating pregnancy through different sites. Visions of Pregnancy: There are many visions indicating the approaching pregnancy, whether the pregnancy is a boy or a girl. A married woman can also see these dreams herself in her dream, or an unmarried girl can see in her dream visions of the upcoming pregnancy of one of her acquaintances or friends. Seeing certain types of animals and birds is a sign of pregnancy. Visions of pregnancy in a dream of a married woman. When a married woman sees in a dream the main teeth of her child, this vision indicates the imminent appearance of pregnancy. Just as a married woman sees beautiful cats in a dream and plays with them, this dream is interpreted as pregnancy. Soon, God willing. While a married woman dreams of marrying again to her husband, the dream symbolizes pregnancy for a boy. Carrying a jug in a dream for a married woman is one of the dreams that indicate the approaching pregnancy of a girl. If a married woman sees herself in a dream wearing golden accessories This indicates the approaching pregnancy. Receiving gifts and perfumes from the husband in a dream is interpreted as an imminent pregnancy, God willing. Interpretation of the dream of a married woman who saw a closed box in her dream, and opened that box to see what was inside it, and the interpretation of the dream is that she is pregnant with a woman. While if she does not open the box, the sign of this is the pregnancy of a male. If a married woman sees the moon in a dream, this indicates pregnancy in a male, and if this moon is in the image of her husband, then this indicates the resemblance between her son and her husband. Among the visions that also indicate pregnancy is seeing The penis in a married woman's dream, as interpreted by the imminent pregnancy of a man. Likewise, seeing a husband in bed or seeing someone exposing his penis in a dream. Dreams indicate that you are pregnant or will soon become pregnant. Among the dreams that indicate that pregnancy is approaching or that you are already pregnant: When you dream of walking on the ground and that ground cracks, then you fall into a hole, this means You are pregnant or will become pregnant soon, God willing. One of the signs of pregnancy or its expected appearance is the frequent vision of disturbing dreams and nightmares. One of the visions that indicate pregnancy is seeing a cat in a dream hanging out in a woman’s dream and clinging to her clothes. The interpretation of the dream is pregnancy in reality. The type of cat indicates the sex of the baby. The female cat symbolizes pregnancy with a female, and the male cat indicates pregnancy with a male. If a woman sees in her dream that her husband’s face is black, this symbolizes the approaching pregnancy and that the sex of the fetus will be female. This is according to the words of God Almighty (And if someone is given news of a woman, his face will remain black and sullen). Visions that indicate pregnancy in a man. Seeing a palm tree in a married woman’s dream is interpreted as being pregnant with a son. Also, seeing an apple in a dream is one of the dreams that indicate pregnancy in a man. And also vision

title: More than 100 evidence and interpretations of teeth falling out in a dream

preview.html: What is the interpretation of a dream about teeth falling out in a dream? The dreamer may see in a dream that one of his teeth has fallen out and horror will certainly fill his heart because it is known that this vision indicates death, but in reality it can indicate many positive associations. You will read in following the lines All interpretations of this dream are through a professional website followed by professionals. Interpretation of a dream about teeth falling out in a dream. Jurists have placed dozens of signs to explain the vision of teeth falling out, varying between promising and bad signs according to the details of the dream, and they will be listed in detail in the following points: Positive connotations that may convey good news to the dreamer He will not die young, but will go through old age, and this is a sign that he will live a long life in this world. There is no doubt that a long life is one of the important foods that God has given to man, and therefore the dreamer must invest these years in doing good deeds that bring him closer to God. Religion One of the things that puts a person in a very bad psychological state is because he will feel humiliated and lacking in dignity when he asks for money from others to meet his necessary requirements, but the fall of a person’s teeth in a dream can represent him. He paid all the money he received from people for the purpose of alleviating his circumstances, which means that he will be freed from the specter of debt and sleep peacefully at the first opportunity. If the fortuneteller sees that all his teeth fell out of his mouth and did not fall to the ground but rather fell into his clothes, this is a sign of an increase in the number of his descendants And God can give him females. And males. Teeth falling out can come with another positive sign, which is that the dreamer has reached a stage of life full of bliss and comfort. This is explained by the fact that if he was sad during the period in which he saw this vision, his sadness will disappear and all his problems will be solved: If the fortuneteller has an illness and prays to God To heal him and restore health and strength to his body, and this disease causes him many problems. Seeing a tooth falling out is a sign that the disease will disappear and that he will enjoy health and well-being soon. If the dreamer’s problems in his life are related to a lack of livelihood, then his teeth falling out in a dream is a sign of concealment and money. Which he will gain soon. It is known that as long as a person’s life conditions are difficult and full of problems, that will be the main reason for his lack of productive efficiency, so the interpretation of the vision may mean that the professional problems that have disturbed his life will go away for a while and he will start again soon and will also achieve great success. Let him be sure that goodness is coming, God willing. Negative connotations Perhaps the meaning of the vision goes back to one of the dreamer’s friends, that is, the jurists said that this dream indicates harm that will happen to a friend close to the dreamer, and there are many forms of this harm. People nearby. The vision indicates obstacles and setbacks that will cause the dreamer to disrupt or stop achieving his life’s hopes, which means that he may feel great difficulty soon in achieving his desires, and this difficulty may be embodied in a lack of money or a lack of people. From cooperating with him to get it

title: Interpretation of seeing peace upon the dead in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams of peace for the dead, and seeing the dead in a dream has many interpretations and explanations, and among these visions about the dead is seeing peace, and peace is a good thing and does not cause anxiety and fear. As the peace of the living to the dead indicates the abundance of sustenance and abundance of goodness in his life, and the peace and kiss of the dead to the living in a dream shows good news, and we will explain in this article through the vision of the peace of the dead to the living for men and women in detail on the summit site. The dream of greeting and kissing the dead indicates a lot of good for the visionary and his obtaining money or inheritance. Interpretation of the dream of peace to the dead and embracing the single woman says that she went through crises and achieved success and distinction in her life. Interpretation of the dream of peace to the deceased father portends a lot of good for the dreamer and overcoming difficult stages. Interpretation of the dream of peace to the dead while laughing It indicates good news for the dreamer and a happy ending for the deceased. You may be interested: Talking to the dead in a dream Interpretation of the dream of peace of the living to the dead in words Seeing peace to the dead indicates success and success in practical life. Seeing peace to the dead also indicates a change in the dreamer's life for the better. And seeing the peace of the dead in the living while smiling at him is evidence of good news. The peace of the dead to the living in a dream for a married woman If a married woman sees that the deceased is hugging her tightly, this indicates that she She will be freed from worries and problems. Seeing her hugging the dead is evidence of the fulfillment of a wish she had wished for and the development of her life for the better. Seeing the deceased father of a woman kissing and shaking hands indicates the goodness of her life and obedience to God and the preservation of her home, husband and children. The peace of a married woman with her deceased relative, uncle or uncle who was smiling at her is a sign of joy, happiness and happy occasions. You may be interested: Seeing 500 riyals in a dream Interpretation of refusing to shake hands with the dead in a dream Refusing to shake hands with the dead indicates wrong actions or indicates that the dreamer suffered injustice and abuse from the deceased. Interpretation of seeing a dead person asking about the person’s condition Seeing a dead person asking about a person can indicate problems and difficulties in his life and they will end. If the dead person smiles, this indicates the good status of the dead person with God, and the vision is a message to follow in his footsteps and follow him. The vision may indicate the need for charity and supplication. Interpretation of a dream of peace for my deceased father Seeing peace in my deceased father indicates the good condition of the dreamer, getting rid of the problems he faces, ending his worries, and settling his debts. Seeing peace in the father also indicates being away from Taboos, righteousness and good qualities. The vision also indicates the achievement of goals and aspirations. You may also be interested in: Pumpkin in a dream Interpretation of a dream about the dead greeting the living with the hand Seeing the dead greeting the living in a dream means the fulfillment of one's desires, comfort after fatigue, relief from fatigue and anxiety, and recovery from illness. Seeing the dead greeting the living in a dream for an unmarried young man means that he will get what he planned in the past and an excellent future. Seeing the living greeting the dead

title: What do you know about the interpretation of a dream about a lion?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a lion for a single womanInterpretation of a dream about a lion for a single woman conveys many interpretations that oscillate between what a person loves and desires, and what a person fears and fears, because the lion is really very scary if it approaches a person and is always placed in cages or special houses in zoos, but in The forest is free and he does what he wants. What is the interpretation of a dream about a lion for a single woman? It is one of the dreams that scares a girl and makes her look for its interpretation to calm her heart. You may find some positives about it in the books of commentators and we will learn that by citing the points below. If a girl sees him in her dream, She is a strong personality who can carry out her tasks in life with the highest efficiency and quality, but she is often disappointed by some friends who she believes are loyal to her and they are the complete opposite. Interpretation of a dream about a single woman seeing a lion approaching her and she is not afraid that she is facing a big problem in her life and she can overcome it, and everyone is amazed at her courage and her ability to solve them and face problems. If the girl herself quarrels with this lion, then there are some disputes between her and a friend or relative, but the girl is her own. The truth and nothing else, and she deserves to be forgiven if she can. Need. If she sees him and is very afraid, then in reality she is also afraid, and fear of the future can be related, for example, to delayed marriage or to fear of falling into sin with someone she loves. A lot, but he tries to exploit her feelings for his benefit in a dishonest way. If she gives the girl security, but she finds it coming to her from where she does not realize it and she manages to escape from it, then this is a sign of a conspiracy planned for her by someone she knows well and trusts except God (). Almighty) saves her from this danger. A girl can see that she is raising a lion or treating him tenderly and does not show any aggressive behavior towards her. This dream expresses the presence of emotional deprivation in the viewer and that he needs the presence of an honest person. Her life in which she feels the happiness that she lacks in her life in general. If a girl sees that she is holding it in her hands, then she will meet a new friend and have many influences and acquaintances that will help her achieve her goals. If a girl sees blood flowing from her body after a quarrel with a lion, then this It means great harm to her as a result of dealing with unhealthy people who have negative feelings towards her and do not like her at all. She must be careful not to deal with new people in the future and protect herself as much as possible. If she sees that she is hugging him in her dream and she is an employee in a specific institution or company, then her vision is a sign of improving her working conditions and obtaining a big promotion that will make her receive a reward that she did not expect, But she is indeed a hardworking person and does everything in her power to do her work in the best way. What is the interpretation of a dream about a lion according to Ibn Sirin? The famous scholar in the interpretation of dreams, Muhammad Ibn Sirin, said that this vision seems disturbing to its owner if she is single, because her experiences in life are few and she has not been exposed to For many situations that refine her personality, here are the details

title: Interpretation of green shoes in a dream and wearing green shoes in a dream

preview.html: A dream about green shoes indicates new, good relationships and other interpretations, and we will interpret it for the unmarried, the married, the pregnant, the divorced, the unmarried, or the married, such as buying green shoes, losing green shoes, finding, offering, or a gift. Of green shoes. , big or small, narrow, wide or new. Or torn, cut, dirty, long, flat, or with heels, according to Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, Imam Al-Sadiq and others on the subject: Interpretation of green shoes in a dream Seeing green shoes in a dream This vision shows that you are not achieving what God wants and indicates that you are extending your hand to the forbidden and that the person who sees That he wears green shoes will fall into a moral problem and will go through a bad psychological state. Green shoes in a dream also show actions that will lead his family to get into some trouble, and green shoes also show the cooperation that you will undertake. Threading green shoes in a dream This vision shows the separation of your friend or lover from you On the moral side, this vision shows the bad situation that you will go through. Seeing green shoes in a dream, this vision shows the beautiful developments that will occur in your life that are related to your professional and family life. Seeing green shoes in a dream generally indicates sadness, anxiety, sudden news that you will hear, and losses. Which you will incur, and seeing yellow shoes in a dream means illness. Green shoes indicate moral weakness, and seeing shoes in a store means that the dreamer is about to enter a new job, or that he will change his profession and head to a new profession. But if the shoes are made of cloth, this indicates going To Hajj, this type of shoe indicates goodness. As for seeing green sandals, it indicates travel, while seeing green winter shoes indicates that you will go through some difficulties and that you will not get what you want. Interpretation of green shoes in a dream by Ibn Sirin, dream interpretation jurists say If a woman sees in her dream that she is wearing new green shoes, this means that this lady will meet a new man in her life and communicate with him, and if the color of the shoes is black. This indicates that this relationship is only a work relationship, but if the color of the shoes is white, this indicates that she will get married soon or that she will receive money from this man. But if a man sees in a dream that he is wearing tight green shoes, this indicates great difficulty in life. But if a man sees in a dream that he is wearing green high-heeled shoes, this indicates that this person has... He achieved something high and made him proud of it in front of him. But if a woman sees in her dream that her green shoes have been stolen, this indicates that this woman will be exposed to many problems with her partner and end up in divorce. Dream Interpretation says seeing wearing green shoes in a dream indicates comfort and tranquility in life. Because the green color in a dream generally indicates goodness, growth, and comfort. Green shoes in a dream mean that its owner is focused on walking

title: Interpretation of Ayat al-Kursi in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen: The correct comprehensive interpretation

preview.html: We will present to you our article today, the interpretation of seeing Ayat al-Kursi in a dream in detail. Many people are accustomed to reading Ayat al-Kursi on a daily basis after every prayer because of its great virtue. He is in a state of confusion because he does not know whether what he saw was a real vision or just a self. Hadith, so many want to know the interpretation of his vision, which varies depending on the state of the dreamer and the details of the dream. Ayat al-Kursi in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Dream interpretation researcher Ibn Sirin says that dreaming of Ayat al-Kursi is good news for the dreamer to gain an abundance of goodness. Memorizing Ayat al-Kursi in a dream indicates that The dreamer is characterized by strong intelligence and quick wit. Whoever sees in his dream that he is reciting Ayat al-Kursi, his dream indicates that there is a large inheritance on his way to him and he will obtain it, but after many problems with his family. If a person sees in his dream that he is reciting Ayat al-Kursi to more than one person From the point of view of the interpreter Ibn Shaheen, the dream of Ayat al-Kursi is one of the most promising dreams for its owners, because it means that the dreamer will change his situation for the better and gain a lot of goodness. Ayat Al-Kursi in a dream generally indicates that God Almighty will bless the dreamer with his blessings in lifespan, wealth, and immunity from devils, that He will give him the best wife and righteous offspring, and that He will save him from temptations and evils. This world. This vision also shows that the dreamer wants to do good and that he does everything good in his life. Whoever sees in a dream that he is reading Ayat Al-Kursi while he is really sick, the vision here is good news that God will heal him from this illness. If one sees in his dream that he is reading Part of Ayat al-Kursi, it means that he will escape from a problem he faces in his life. If the dreamer is married and dreams that she is reading Ayat al-Kursi, then her dream indicates that God will grant her righteous offspring if she does not have children, and if she has children, then her dream indicates that she will visit the house. forbidden. God. A pregnant woman’s dream of reciting Ayat al-Kursi indicates that her due date is approaching, and that she is constantly praying to God to make her affairs easy for her and save her from all harm. But if the dreamer is an unmarried girl and she sees in her dream that she is reciting Ayat al-Kursi, then this dream symbolizes that she A pious girl, close to God and kind-hearted, she is immune from all evil. Interpretation of Ayat Al-Kursi in a dream for an unmarried woman. Reciting Ayat Al-Kursi in an unmarried girl’s dream is evidence that the dreamer seeks to gain God’s satisfaction and closeness to Him, and that God will save her from envy, the evil eye, and evil. Whoever sees in her dream that someone is reading Ayat Al-Kursi and this verse is repeated from Behind it, her dreams indicate that God will grant her marriage to a good man who will treat her well and live a happy life with him. One of the most promising visions is an unmarried girl’s dream of Ayat al-Kursi, as it is a sign of the collapse of her worries and sorrows and her recovery if she falls ill. Ayat al-Kursi in a dream about a married woman. A dream about a married woman Reciting Ayat Al-Kursi is one of the most promising dreams to relieve her distress and free her from her worries and problems

title: Interpretation of a dream about urinating in the bathroom for a divorced woman

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing urinating in the bathroom in a dream for a single girl: Seeing an unmarried girl urinating in her dream is a good sign that she will have a boyfriend after her marriage. Also, seeing an unmarried woman urinating indicates the disappearance of her worries, God willing. Unlike seeing urine in a dream, it is not praiseworthy for her. It symbolizes the disappearance of the hardships that cause sadness, but God will provide for her death, God willing. If one sees someone urinating in a dream, this indicates the financial crisis that this person is going through. God is Most High and Most Knowing. Urinating on an unmarried girl in a place she does not know is a sign that news has arrived that will make her life happy. Seeing urinating in a dream could be a sign of death and a solution to the problems in her life. When you see a girl urinating, this indicates a happy marriage, God willing. As for seeing A public place and a girl urinates in front of people. This indicates that he will get money, but this is due to the amount of urine. And God knows best. As for seeing urinating in sand or mud, it is a warning for ablution that must be shortened, and prayer is not obligatory to perform it, and it must reconsider itself. She dreams of urinating on a girl’s bed. It indicates that her future husband will be rich, and God knows best. In The condition of the clothes being completely wet due to urinating on the clothes. It indicates that he has a good and good reputation among people and always arouses kindness. But if she controls herself in the dream from the process of urinating. It indicates her confusion in the affairs of her life and her inability to make the right decision until she makes it if she does. God willing, I know. See also: Interpretation of urinating in a dream in detail by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of watching urinating in the bathroom in a dream for a married woman. When a married woman sees a lot of Uroma in her dream, this is a sign that her worries and sorrows will disappear and comfort will come to her, God willing. In the event that urine comes into contact with her from a known person. Urinating in a dream. An indication of the benefits that you will gain from this person, God willing. A married woman is suffering from a delayed pregnancy, and she saw in a dream that she was urinating on her bed. Indicating almost positive news about the appearance of pregnancy and good offspring. God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of seeing urinating in the bathroom in a dream about a man and its meaning. When a man dreams of urinating in the toilet in a dream, this is a sign that money will come to him, God willing. Perhaps this dream is nothing but a good sign of repaying the debt that he has accumulated, thanks to God. The process Urinating in the toilet in a merchant’s dream symbolizes the profits he will make from this trade. Seeing a woman in a dream urinating on him in a dream. Perhaps he will benefit from this woman through their work together, and God knows best. Also, the previous vision may indicate her marriage, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. If a man wakes up in a dream and urinates on his bed, this indicates marriage to another woman. Or it may be good news that he will be blessed with good and righteous offspring. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about urinating on clothes. The meaning of seeing urine in the bathroom in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation. When a pregnant woman dreams that she is urinating, but the urine is He fills the clothes. This vision indicates the birth of a child

title: Interpretation of leaves in a dream, white paper in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of paper for a single girl, for a married girl, for a pregnant woman, whether it is written, official, signature, signature, ink and pen. Exam papersThe letter written on paper in a dream is of great importance, as it is the core and essence of the interpretation, and there is no mark on paper in the dream without writing. Receiving written documents in a dream means receiving important news, especially if the paper is sealed or signed by an official or governmental body. He sees in his dream as if he is receiving blank papers, then in waking life or in reality he does not need advice or guidance, he is completely independent and completely responsible for his actions. As for the person who sees in his dream that he is showing his identity papers (such as a passport, driver’s license, ID card), This means that he needs to reveal the hidden aspects of himself, and make others around him more confident and reassured about him. If data appears on those papers that contradict his personal data, such as (name, photo, date of birth), then this is an interpretation that the dreamer does not know a lot about himself. Or he conceals from others what he is not aware of. Turns out. Papers appear in our dreams in the form of newspapers, magazines and even pamphlets and excerpts. The newspaper provides him with news, documents, or official documents that explain to him in a dream the truth about himself or his original value. Papers folded without care in a dream demand that we take more care of our credibility and strive to open a new page in life entitled hope, ambition, and success. Documents that contain data and information, in the form of numbers. Or images or words, obliging us to keep our secrets and not be lenient in dealing with them, because any failure in this regard can lead to serious consequences and disastrous consequences. If a single girl sees that she is writing words on a piece of paper or a white page, then upon waking up she can begin to begin Something new or reshaping her life in a radical or fundamental way. As for an unmarried woman who sees in her dream that she is tearing up papers or throwing them in the trash, this may indicate the end of problems or pain related to past memories or difficult experiences. Writing on paper can benefit White in a dream is from conveying the fortuneteller’s feelings to another person, like the same dream, and revealing and declaring very special feelings such as feelings of love. Papers in a married woman’s dream have great importance because they may indicate money if they contain numbers and may indicate an event or news that is Its content is what was written on these papers. The dates and names written on papers in the dream may be real or accurate and may indicate important moments or rights in the future, such as traveling, working, or obtaining approval from a certain place. Documents containing names, dates and numbers are very likely to refer to financial contracts or transactions, such as loan payments, account statements, property contracts, sales and lease contracts, sometimes inheritance, etc. White papers in a vision or dream are often positive and good for a married woman and others because they can To indicate the disappearance of problems

title: Interpretation of a dream about a dining room and a table in a dream

preview.html: Seeing a table in a dream for a single woman, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman, for a man, a dining room full of food, a wooden or iron table, round chairs, defining the vision, displaying a meal or a table in the kitchen according to Ibn Sirin and others. The table in a dream is considered one of the Western dreams that It is difficult to interpret easily if it is seen in a dream, as it can concern many people around the world if they see it in a dream to get its correct interpretation. And know the signs that may come upon the person and see the table or table in the dream. Dreams differ in many interpretations around the world in order to get their correct interpretation and can be interpreted through the color and size in the dream. Many interpreters around the world have interpreted that the painting in the dream shows the ultimate success of things in social life and we will examine for you the interpretations of the interpreter Ibn Sirin, one of the most important interpreters around the world. Interpretation of a table in a dreamIf the dreamer eats from the food of this table, the vision shows the goodness and benefit that the dreamer actually derives from this person. The table or dining room indicates a pure, honest, and generous person. If one sees in a dream that he is sitting on The dining table, then his vision indicates the combination and companionship of a generous man with money and an honest man in reality. And the person who sees in his dream that he is sitting at the dining table accompanied by several men, then the vision shows the role played by one of those known for their justice in spreading friendship and love among the people gathered at the table in Waking up. Life. The more plates of food and loaves of bread there are on the table in a dream, the greater the love and familiarity between the people gathered at the table in real life, as narrated by Imam Ibn Sirin. And the situation in which one sees them sharing loaves of bread on the table or on the table in a dream, It refers to the rivalry and hostility that some people show to the viewer in reality. Especially if the fortuneteller eats from these loaves of bread after spreading them on the table. It is said that seeing a table containing one or two colors of food in a dream represents the food and goodness that reaches the dreamer and his children in reality. As for seeing eating from Food is on the table or on the table in the dream. The imam mentioned two cases of this vision. The long life that the dreamer lives and the longevity of his life. But if he sees in a dream that the plates of food on the table or on the table have been emptied, then seeing him at that time indicates the approaching term and the end of life. In some statements received from interpreters, it was mentioned that seeing a table Food in a dream is an indication and reference to the blessings and abundance of the life that the dreamer lives. In other cases, the answer to the prayer that the fortuneteller called for during the prayer is given. It was said that seeing the table in a dream is an indication of victory, empowerment, and the victory that the dreamer achieves over his opponents and enemies, and the spoils that he obtains if the dreamer eats. From that table.Interpretation of a table in a dream for a single woman, an unmarried girl
